Error.name: wrong_shard_server
Error.description: Shard is not available from this server

Error.name: coordinated_state_conflict
Error.description: Conflict occurred while changing coordination information

Error.name: transaction_too_old
Error.description: Transaction is too old to perform reads or be committed

Error.name: movekeys_conflict
Error.description: Conflicting attempts to change data distribution

Error.name: not_committed
Error.description: Transaction not committed due to conflict with another transaction

Error.name: commit_unknown_result
Error.description: Transaction may or may not have committed

Error.name: transaction_cancelled
Error.description: Operation aborted because the transaction was cancelled

Error.name: new_coordinators_timed_out
Error.description: New coordination servers did not respond in a timely way

Error.name: watch_cancelled
Error.description: Watch cancelled because storage server watch limit exceeded

Error.name: request_maybe_delivered
Error.description: Request may or may not have been delivered

Error.name: transaction_timed_out
Error.description: Operation aborted because the transaction timed out

Error.name: watches_disabled
Error.description: Watches cannot be set if read your writes is disabled

Error.name: default_error_or
Error.description: Default error for an ErrorOr object

Error.name: accessed_unreadable
Error.description: Read or wrote an unreadable key

Error.name: process_behind
Error.description: Storage process does not have recent mutations

Error.name: cluster_version_changed
Error.description: The protocol version of the cluster has changed

Error.name: external_client_already_loaded
Error.description: External client has already been loaded

Error.name: recruitment_failed
Error.comment: Be careful, catching this will delete the data of a storage server or tlog permanently

Error.name: move_to_removed_server
Error.description: Attempt to move keys to a storage server that was removed

Error.name: worker_removed
Error.comment: Be careful, catching this will delete the data of a storage server or tlog permanently

Error.name: master_max_versions_in_flight
Error.description: Master hit maximum number of versions in flight

Error.name: master_tlog_failed
Error.description: Master terminating because a TLog failed
Error.comment: similar to tlog_stopped, but the tlog has actually die

Error.name: worker_recovery_failed
Error.description: Recovery of a worker process failed

Error.name: please_reboot_delete
Error.description: Reboot of server process requested, with deletion of state

Error.name: master_proxy_failed
Error.description: Master terminating because a Proxy failed

Error.name: master_resolver_failed
Error.description: Master terminating because a Resolver failed

Error.name: no_cluster_file_found
Error.description: No cluster file found in current directory or default location

Error.name: file_too_large
Error.description: File too large to be read

Error.name: non_sequential_op
Error.description: Non sequential file operation not allowed

Error.name: io_timeout
Error.description: A disk IO operation failed to complete in a timely manner

Error.name: file_corrupt
Error.description: A structurally corrupt data file was detected

Error.name: http_request_failed
Error.description: HTTP response code not received or indicated failure

Error.name: http_auth_failed
Error.description: HTTP request failed due to bad credentials

Error.name: inverted_range
Error.description: Range begin key larger than end key

Error.name: invalid_option_value
Error.description: Option set with an invalid value

Error.name: invalid_option
Error.description: Option not valid in this context

Error.name: network_not_setup
Error.description: Action not possible before the network is configured

Error.name: network_already_setup
Error.description: Network can be configured only once

Error.name: read_version_already_set
Error.description: Transaction already has a read version set

Error.name: used_during_commit
Error.description: Operation issued while a commit was outstanding

Error.name: attribute_too_large
Error.description: Attribute too large for type int

Error.name: transaction_invalid_version
Error.description: Transaction does not have a valid commit version

Error.name: no_commit_version
Error.description: Transaction is read-only and therefore does not have a commit version

Error.name: environment_variable_network_option_failed
Error.description: Environment variable network option could not be set

Error.name: transaction_read_only
Error.description: Attempted to commit a transaction specified as read-only

Error.name: api_version_already_set
Error.description: API version may be set only once

Error.name: exact_mode_without_limits
Error.description: EXACT streaming mode requires limits, but none were given

Error.name: invalid_tuple_data_type
Error.description: Unrecognized data type in packed tuple

Error.name: invalid_tuple_index
Error.description: Tuple does not have element at specified index

Error.name: key_not_in_subspace
Error.description: Cannot unpack key that is not in subspace

Error.name: manual_prefixes_not_enabled
Error.description: Cannot specify a prefix unless manual prefixes are enabled

Error.name: prefix_in_partition
Error.description: Cannot specify a prefix in a partition

Error.name: mismatched_layer
Error.description: Directory has already been created with a different layer string

Error.name: cannot_move_directory_between_partitions
Error.description: Directory cannot be moved between partitions

Error.name: cannot_use_partition_as_subspace
Error.description: Directory partition cannot be used as subspace

Error.name: incompatible_directory_version
Error.description: Directory layer was created with an incompatible version

Error.name: directory_prefix_not_empty
Error.description: Database has keys stored at the prefix chosen by the automatic prefix allocator

Error.name: directory_prefix_in_use
Error.description: Directory layer already has a conflicting prefix

Error.name: backup_bad_block_size
Error.description: Backup file block size too small

Error.name: backup_cannot_expire
Error.description: Cannot expire requested data from backup without violating minimum restorability

Error.name: backup_auth_missing
Error.description: Cannot find authentication details (such as a password or secret key) for the specified Backup Container URL

Error.name: backup_auth_unreadable
Error.description: Cannot read or parse one or more sources of authentication information for Backup Container URLs

Error.name: restore_corrupted_data_padding
Error.description: Backup file has unexpected padding bytes

Error.name: restore_destination_not_empty
Error.description: Attempted to restore into a non-empty destination database

Error.name: restore_duplicate_uid
Error.description: Attempted to restore using a UID that had been used for an aborted restore

Error.name: task_interrupted
Error.description: Task execution stopped due to timeout, abort, or completion by another worker
